text: Cun ʙa oʙi cohi sahri Madjan rasid, guruhe az mardumro did, ki corpojoni xudro oʙ medihand va dar kanori onho du zanro did, ki gusfandoni xudro ʙozmedorand va ʙa coh nazdik namesavand, Muso guft: «Sumo ci mekuned, caro gusfandoni xudro oʙ namedihed?» Guftand: «Mo onhoro oʙ namedihem, to on goh ki cuponho ʙozgardand va ʙiravand, ki padari mo piri kuhansol ast va tavonoii in korro nadorad.»
